  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2387</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Different types of microscopes as a tool for the Scientist</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterschiedliche Typen der Mikroskope als 
Hilfsmittel für den Wissenschaftler</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Différents types de microscopes comme outil pour
le scientifique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tipos diferentes de microscópios como uma 
ferramenta para o cientista</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tipi differenti di microscopii come strumento per
lo scienziato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαφορετικοί τύποι μικροσκοπίων ως εργαλείο για τον 
επιστήμονα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diversos tipos de microscopios como herramienta 
para el científico</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Simulations of different types of microscope including, the phase contrast microscpe, the electron transmission microscope, scanning tunneling microscope and the fluorescence microscope</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">scientific instruments</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">scientific discovery</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">microscopy</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Simulationen der unterschiedlichen Typen des 
Mikroskops einschließlich, des Phase Kontrast microscpe, des 
Elektronübertragung Mikroskops, des absuchenden Einen Tunnel anlegen 
Mikroskops und des Fluoreszenzmikroskops</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Simulations de différents types de microscope 
comprenant, du microscpe de contraste de phase, du microscope de 
transmission d'électron, de microscope de balayage de perçage d'un 
tunnel et du microscope de fluorescence</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Simulações de tipos diferentes de microscópio 
including, do microscpe do contraste da fase, do microscópio da 
transmissão do elétron, de microscópio fazendo a varredura 
tunneling e do microscópio do fluorescence</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Simulazioni dei tipi differenti di microscopio 
compreso, del microscpe di contrasto di fase, del microscopio della 
trasmissione dell'elettrone, di microscopio d'esplorazione di traforo 
e dei microscopii di fluorescenza</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσομοιώσεις των διαφορετικών τύπων μικροσκοπίων 
συμπεριλαμβανομένου, η αντίθεση φάσης microscpe, του 
μικροσκοπίου μετάδοσης ηλεκτρονίων, του ανιχνευτικού ανοίγοντας 
μικροσκοπίου και του μικροσκοπίου φθορισμού</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Simulaciones de diversos tipos de microscopio 
incluyendo, del microscpe del contraste de la fase, del microscopio de
la transmisión del electrón, de microscopio de exploración el hacer
un túnel y del microscopio de la fluorescencia</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">wissenschaftliche Instrumente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
